summary: Currently makes standalone vanilla quivers more petite for lower back or hip mounting, arrows remain the same.
descriptionHtml:
This is a standalone quick Nifskope edit of 12 vanilla quivers. Lets call it an Alpha! Currently only supports vanilla Skyrim quivers (maybe tomorrow) to allow the quivers fit on the lower back better with XP32 Maximum Skeleton v1.7 Chesko Default (or hip if you feel frisky)

I reduced the vertices on X+Z by 20%-40% and Y by 10%-20% in some cases, then realigned the arrows. None of the arrows sizes or amounts have changed, only the quivers\' scale. 

Stuff to do;
drawn alignment? 1st 3rd person? I would make them longer, but want them to stick out more? maybe?
I\'m planning on adding support for Dawnguard, Dragonborn, ACE Combat, SKyRe, stuffs and things. Maybe tomorrow. Maybe after. Maybe after after. Maybe these should work first. :)

Manual Install only (maybe tomorrow);
Open .rar drop data folder into your skyrim folder, enable PetiteQuivers.esp, yell at me for it breaking your coffee machine. 

Uninstall; delete stuff, (stuff being petitequivers.esp and /data/meshes/weapons/quivers) will not effect your game in any way.

Requires Skyrim.  They are now craftable at a tanning rack under MISC, require 1  leather strips and 1 firewood. 

 help Petite 

Questions comments? Did I break it again?

Added a replacer version, will not work with other mods that replace vanilla arrow/quiver meshes, will work with texture replacers.
author: bootaka
